page.title: 02Facilities in P.W. F.O.Green
page.content: Five Oak Green's main development followed the outbreak of the Black Death in Capel. People moved out of the plague stricken village and established a new village,Five Oak Green. Facilities in Five Oak Green include a primary school,a police station and several shops. There are also two churches. Facilities in the Paddock Wood area include a larger primary school and a comprehensive school,a new fire station,only recently opened, and three churches. There are several new housing estates as well as several areas of land at present under construction.The village centre contains a variety of shops and offices.
